entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
